commit_loop_processes.Name: powershell.exe
commit_loop_processes.CommandLine: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.Name -eq 'powershell.exe' -and $_.CommandLine -match 'copilot_commit.ps1' } | Select-Object ProcessId, Name, CommandLine | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2"
